mention.text: 29 sep 89 -- police sources reported today that a spaniard , a frenchman , and an italian , kidnapped in tecun uman on 27 september
spaniard jose maria martinez , frenchman roberto lisandy , and italian dino rossy
the persons who kidnapped the three men
